DOC.brief_summary: This An Open-label , Randomized , Single-center , 4-way Crossover , Single dose Bioequivalence Study Comparing Omeprazole 20 40-mg Aqueous solvent Based Capsules Manufactured AstraZeneca Omeprazole 20 40-mg Organic-solvent Based Capsules Manufactured Merck
